text:
闭幕式主持稿（中文版）
尊敬的各位领导、嘉宾、亲爱的青年朋友们，大家晚上好！
在这金秋十月，我们欢聚在这里，共同见证一场跨越国界、跨越文化的盛大交流。 我是本次北京友好城市国际青年交流营暨“金砖+”青年交流活动交流分享会的中方主持人XXX，非常荣幸能够主持今晚的活动，为本届交流营画上一个圆满的句号。
一、介绍嘉宾
首先，请允许我为大家介绍出席分享会及青年联欢的领导和嘉宾，他们是：
trans:
Closing Ceremony Host (Chinese Version)
Honorable leaders, guests, dear young friends, good evening to you all!
In this golden October, we gather here to witness a grand exchange across borders and cultures. I am XXX, the Chinese host of the Beijing Sister City Youth Camp and "BRICS+" Youth Exchange. It's my great honor to host this evening event and bring this camp to a successful conclusion.
I. Introduction of Guests
First of all, please allow me to introduce the leaders and guests attending the sharing session and the youth party, they are:
